articles.title: Proposed seminar on national reunification hailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Proposed seminar on national reunification hailed in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The headquarters for the promotion of the 2001 joint events of the nation for implementing the south-north joint declaration declared that it would positively accept the north's proposal for holding a grand seminar on national reunification on Mt. Kumgang, a joint event marking the first anniversary of the declaration, to be participated in by Koreans from all walks of life in the north, south and abroad, Seoul-based Radio No.1 reported. The headquarters consists of the people's council for national reconciliation and cooperation and seven religious organizations in South Korea.
 The headquarters said it would conduct multifarious events to mark the first anniversary of the joint declaration, mainly under the sponsorship of bodies in the south and the north for the promotion of June 15 commemoration functions.   
 Political parties and organizations in the DPRK held a joint meeting in Pyongyang on May 28 to discuss immediate measures to pave the way for reunification by the efforts of the nation at which they earnestly called for waging a positive nationwide movement to bring earlier the day of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Greetings to Macedonian foreign minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Macedonian foreign minister 
    Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Ilinka Mitreva, foreign minister of Macedonia.
 Extending congratulations to her appointment as foreign minister of Macedonia, the message wished her success in her work.

Yang Hyong Sop meets Danish ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop meets Danish ambassador
    Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Christoffer Bo Bramsen, Danish ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell visit to him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
